name: TradingView Flat Dark Theme
description:
##### PLEASE READ ###### Chart colors wont change via CSS code, you need to click on preferences (gear icon above chart) yourselves and change chart background, candle colors etc yourselves! Sorry! In future I will provide hex values for the colors I use in the screenshot, so you can try to match best you can with their stupid color picker. Sorry but it's out of my control! ########################
TradeTheTrend-sponsored dark theme to improve the look and feel of TradingView. This is a minimal design: many share features have been removed from the charting page.
additional_info:
YOU CANNOT CHANGE CHART COLORS WITH CSS CODE.
In order to change chart colors, you have to use the color pickers within the preferences pane (click gear icon above chart). Sorry!

discussions.name: How do I get this color sheme for the charts?
is the chart supposed to be white?
How to install it with user script? It doesn't work with userstyles, chart doesn't change.
Chart is white, tried with Tampermonkey and Stylish
YOUR CHART COLORS STILL DEFAULT? READ THIS FORUM POST  (click "see more" at bottom)
